titleInfo.title: All For the Hall with Keith Urban and Vince Gill at the Bridgestone Arena

mods.abstract: Three color window card (red, light blue, and navy on white) announcing All for The Hall with Keith Urban and Vince at the Bridgestone Arena on April 16. Poster features dingbats.
